1.name: The Godfather
1.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

2.name: Cabaret
2.description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

3.name: Deliverance
3.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

4.name: Young Winston
4.description: Complex family relationships, as well as a combat experience, form the personality of the future world-famous politician.

5.name: The Poseidon Adventure
5.description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

6.name: Last Tango in Paris
6.description: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

7.name: The Last House on the Left
7.description: Two teenage girls head to a rock concert for one's birthday. While trying to score marijuana in the city, they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

8.name: Avanti!
8.description: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon-father's body only to discover dad died with his mistress of long standing.

9.name: The Way of the Dragon
9.description: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

10.name: Pink Flamingos
10.description: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

11.name: The Heartbreak Kid
11.description: Three days into his Miami honeymoon, New York Jewish Lenny meets tall, blonde Kelly. This confirms him in his opinion that he has made a serious mistake and he decides he wants Kelly ...                See full summary »

12.name: Frenzy
12.description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

13.name: Jeremiah Johnson
13.description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by Indians, and proves to be a match for their warriors in one-on-one combat on the early frontier.

14.name: Fist of Fury
14.description: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

15.name: Slaughterhouse-Five
15.description: A man named Billy Pilgrim tells the story of how he became unstuck in time and was abducted by aliens.

16.name: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
16.description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

17.name: Silent Running
17.description: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

18.name: The Getaway
18.description: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

19.name: Cries & Whispers
19.description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

20.name: Sisters
20.description: A fledgling Staten Island journalist witnesses a brutal murder in the neighboring apartment of a French-Canadian model, but the police do not believe that the crime took place. With the help of a private detective, she seeks out the truth.

21.name: The Cowboys
21.description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

22.name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
22.description: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

23.name: The Valachi Papers
23.description: Gangster Joe Valachi is a marked man in the same joint where mob boss Don Vito Genovese is imprisoned and he's forced to co-operate with the DA in exchange for protection.

24.name: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
24.description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

25.name: Joe Kidd
25.description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

26.name: What's Up, Doc?
26.description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

27.name: Fritz the Cat
27.description: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of various elements on the 1960s.

28.name: Sleuth
28.description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

29.name: The Big Bird Cage
29.description: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

30.name: Boxcar Bertha
30.description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

31.name: The Mechanic
31.description: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

32.name: Prime Cut
32.description: A vicious Kansas City slaughterhouse owner and his hick family are having a bloody "beef" with the Chicago crime syndicate over profits from their joint illegal operations. Top enforcer Nick Devlin is sent to straighten things out.

33.name: The Canterbury Tales
33.description: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

34.name: Dr. Phibes Rises Again
34.description: The vengeful doctor rises again, seeking the Scrolls of Life in an attempt to resurrect his deceased wife.

35.name: Frogs
35.description: A group of helpless victims celebrate a birthday on an island estate crawling with killer amphibians, birds, insects, and reptiles.

36.name: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
36.description: Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits.

37.name: Ben
37.description: A lonely boy befriends Ben, the leader of a violent pack of killer rats.

38.name: Super Fly
38.description: The daily routine of cocaine dealer Priest who wants to score one more super deal and retire.

39.name: Blacula
39.description: An ancient African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula himself, finds himself in modern Los Angeles.

40.name: Man of La Mancha
40.description: The funny story of mad but kind and chivalrous elderly nobleman Don Quixote who, aided by his squire Sancho Panza, fights windmills that are seen as dragons to save prostitute Dulcinea who is seen as a noblewoman.

41.name: Dracula A.D. 1972
41.description: Johnny Alucard raises Count Dracula from the dead in London in 1972. The Count goes after the descendants of Van Helsing.

42.name: Horror Express
42.description: In 1906, in China, a British anthropologist discovers a frozen prehistoric creature and must transport it to Europe by train.

43.name: Roma
43.description: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

44.name: Don't Torture a Duckling
44.description: A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town rife with superstition and a distrust of outsiders.

45.name: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
45.description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

46.description: A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

47.name: The Case of the Bloody Iris
47.description: Having recently escaped the clutches of a hippie sex cult, a beautiful model is pursued by a serial killer whose previous victims include former occupants of her new apartment.

48.name: Night of the Lepus
48.description: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

49.name: State of Siege
49.description: Using the interrogation of a US counterinsurgency agent as a backdrop, the film explores the consequences of the struggle between Uruguay's government and the leftist Tupamaro guerrillas.

50.name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
50.description: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.
